00087 inline void StiHit::reset()
00088 {
00089     mrefangle = mposition = mx = my = mz = msxx = msyy = mszz = msxy = msxz = msyz = 0.;
00090     mused = false;
00091     mdetector = 0;
00092     msthit = 0;
00093 }

00125 inline void StiHit::set(double refAngle, double position, double x, double y, double z, 
00126                         double sxx, double sxy, double sxz, double syy, double syz, double szz) 
00127 {

00134     msyy = syy;

00138     msyz = syz;

00158 inline bool StiHit::operator==(const StiHit& rhs)
00159 {
00160     return ( mrefangle==rhs.mrefangle && mposition==rhs.mposition &&
00161              mx==rhs.mx && my==rhs.my && mz==rhs.mz );
00162 }
00163 
00164 inline StiHit& StiHit::operator=(const StiHit& rhs)
00165 {
00166     if (*this==rhs) return *this;
00167     copyToThis(rhs);
00168     return *this;
00169 }
00170 
00171 inline void StiHit::copyToThis(const StiHit& rhs)
00172 {
00173     mrefangle = rhs.mrefangle;
00174     mposition = rhs.mposition;
00175     mx = rhs.mx;
00176     my = rhs.my;
00177     mz = rhs.mz;
00178     msxx = rhs.msxx;
00179     msyy = rhs.msyy;
00180     mszz = rhs.mszz;
00181     msxy = rhs.msxy;
00182     msxz = rhs.msxz;
00183     msyz = rhs.msyz;
00184     mused = rhs.mused;
00185 }
